def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, y, z in get3idxs(idxs):
        check_xyz_line = is_line([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_x_large = is_large(x, ctx)
        check_x_grey = is_grey(x, ctx)
        check_y_right = are_right([y], [x], ctx)
        check_z_right = are_right([z], [y], ctx)
        check_y_lighter_x = are_lighter([y], [x], ctx)
        check_z_darker_y = are_darker([z], [y], ctx)
        if (
            check_xyz_line
            and check_x_large
            and check_x_grey
            and check_y_right
            and check_z_right
            and check_y_lighter_x
            and check_z_darker_y
        ):
            results.append([x,y,z])
    return results

def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for a, in get1idxs(idxs):
        for x, in get1idxs(idxs):
            check_x_left = are_left([x], [a], ctx)
            check_x_small = is_small(x, ctx)
            check_a_large = is_large(a, ctx)
            check_a_dark = is_dark(a, ctx)
            check_far = get_distance(a, x, ctx) > 2
            if (
                check_x_left
                and check_x_small
                and check_a_large
                and check_a_dark
                and check_far
            ):
                results.append([a, x])
    return results
state = turn(state)
